name: elm-panama-sign-up-front-end
description: This is the code that powers the Elm Panam√° sign-up sheet front-end.

scripts.docker:bash: docker exec -it `docker ps | grep signup_website | awk '{print $1}'` bash
scripts.docker:init: npm run docker:update && npm run docker:start && npm run docker:bash || true
scripts.docker:kill: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:rm

author: Christopher Duncan <cj.duncan.a@gmail.com>
